name: Glenda Athus, PharmD
title: Manager of Global Affairs
shortBio: Glenda has been vital to the forward momentum of AEA. Coordinates medical and school supplies from overseas to Haiti. Facilitates training for school teachers and team training on healthcare. Coordinates all aspects of week-long mission trips to Haiti and other parts of the world. Prepares various aspects of the organization including maintaining communication via quarterly newsletters, designing print and visual presentations for the broad promotion of the organization. Assists with the distribution of medications, partnering with the medical team to provide quality care to the needy.
